texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["If you drive in London you may need to pay the Congestion Charge, Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) and/or Low Emission Zone (LEZ) charges. Your number plate (Vehicle Registration Mark) will tell us which charges you need to pay."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eCongestion Charge:\u003c/strong\u003e pay for the previous\u003cstrong\u003echarging\u003c/strong\u003e day, today, the next\u003cstrong\u003echarging\u003c/strong\u003e day or for a custom date range","\u003cstrong\u003eULEZ:\u003c/strong\u003e pay for the previous\u003cstrong\u003eworking\u003c/strong\u003e day, today, tomorrow or for a custom date range","\u003cstrong\u003eLEZ:\u003c/strong\u003e pay for the previous\u003cstrong\u003eworking\u003c/strong\u003e day, today or any day up to 90 days in the future"]}
Discounts or exemptions won't be applied to your vehicle unless you sign in to your account .
From 26 October 2020, LEZ standards will be tougher for heavier vehicles. Your vehicle may not meet these new standards. Check if you will need to pay a LEZ charge.
